languages.text: "Долг. Не знаю точно, что задумал Ксавьер, но, судя по прошлым его поступкам, это будет нечто грандиозное и ужасное. Его необходимо остановить".
"Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."
languages.original_text: "Долг. Не знаю точно, что задумал Ксавьер, но, судя по прошлым его поступкам, это будет нечто грандиозное и ужасное. Его необходимо остановить".

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier is planning, but judging by his former actions it is going to be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier is planning, but judging by his former actions it is going to be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I don't know what exactly is on Xavier's mind, but judging by his former actions, it is going to be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped in his tracks."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I don't know what exactly is on Xavier's mind, but judging by his former actions, it is going to be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped in his tracks."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

languages.text: « Le devoir. J'ignore ce que prépare Xavier, mais d'après ce qu'il a fait par le passé, c'est un projet à la fois terrible et ambitieux. Il faut l'empêcher de nuire. »
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

traits.locale_text: « Le devoir. J'ignore ce que prépare Xavier, mais d'après ce qu'il a fait dernièrement, c'est un projet à la fois terrible et ambitieux. Il faut y couper court. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Por el deber. No sé lo que está tramando Xavier, pero a juzgar por lo que ya ha hecho se trata de algo ambicioso y terrible. Hay que detenerle».
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

traits.locale_text: «Por el deber. No sé lo que está tramando Xavier, pero a juzgar por lo que ya ha hecho se trata de algo ambicioso y terrible. Debo detener lo que quiera que sea».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “职责所在。我不知道希维尔有什么打算，但从他之前的举动来看，他的野心恐怕会带来可怕的结果。我必须阻止他的阴谋。”
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

traits.locale_text: “职责所在。我不知道希维尔有什么打算，但从他之前的举动来看，他的野心恐怕会带来可怕的结果。我必须阻止他的阴谋。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「責務だ。ザビエルの心中がどのようなものか正確にはわからないが、かつての行動から判断すると、野心的で恐ろしいものになりそうだ。彼を足止めする必要がある」
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

traits.locale_text: 「責務だ。ザビエルの心中がどのようなものか正確にはわからないが、かつての行動から判断すると、野心的で恐ろしいものになりそうだ。彼を足止めする必要がある」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Pflicht. Ich weiß nicht genau, was Xavier vorhat, doch seinen bisherigen Taten nach zu urteilen, wird es ehrgeizig und grauenhaft. Man muss ihn aufhalten!"
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."

traits.locale_text: "Pflicht. Ich weiß nicht genau, was Xavier vorhat, doch seinen bisherigen Taten nach zu urteilen, wird es ehrgeizig und grauenhaft. Er muss aufgehalten werden."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Görev. Xavier'in aklında tam olarak ne var bilmiyorum ama geçmişte yaptıklarına bakılırsa ihtiraslı ve fena bir şey olacak. Durdurulması gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Duty. I do not know what exactly Xavier has in mind, but judging by his past actions, it will be ambitious and terrible. He must be stopped."
